dialogue.text: I tap on Sara’s name in my phone and wait for her to answer.
The last time she came over ended in an unprecedented success, so I’m hoping for more of the same this time.
Well, in the broad sense at least. I’d much prefer if I actually got to spend time with {i}her{/i} instead of her and my [niece].
Hey, [saramaster]~ What’s up?
Not much. What are you doing?
Oh you know. A little of this. A little of that.
I’m off tonight~
Are you actually off or are you just going to make Sana cover for you when I invite you over?
Does the answer to that really matter?
I guess it doesn’t.
Hehehe~ Good. Then I’ll be right over.
A mostly empty home is what I find after opening the door.
Empty in the sense that Ami is nowhere to be found and won’t be returning any time soon.
She sent me a text on the way home that her and some of the others were going to the movies tonight.
But it’s not like it’s {i}entirely{/i} empty in the fact that-
Well, I’m here.
And soon someone else will be here as well.
And there’s also the furniture and...the walls and...
Everything that makes a house a house.
I don’t know what I’m talking about.
I’m not great at thinking when I’m alone.
I always wind up just endlessly scrolling through Facebook and liking the pictures of pretty girls who will never talk to me.
Hellooooo~ Special delivery! One beautiful mom!
What an excellent delivery. There should be a service that specializes in just that.
You can let yourself in.
I shout to Sara from the living room.
The front door is thin so I don’t doubt that she’ll be able to hear me.
Why hello there. Did I keep you waiting long?
Not long at all. I only got here a few minutes ago myself.
Is that so?
Where’s Ami?
Not here.
You mean we have the place to ourselves tonight?
It certainly appears that way. The girls are out watching some action movie or something.
Excellent...excellent.
You must have been upset that you didn’t get me all to yourself last time, huh?
I guess so. Which is weird because, if anything, I figured you would be the one to be upset.
You say that as if I like you or something. I wonder what gave you that idea?
It sure as hell can’t be the fact that you’re borderline-obsessed with me, now could it?
O-Obsessed?! I’m not obsessed!
That’s really mean!
We’re supposed to mutually like each other! You’re supposed to want to hold my hand and stuff!
Love me more or I’ll hit you.
I can’t imagine you hitting me would do much.
I wouldn’t be so sure, Sensei. I got into tons of fights in [high_school]. I’m vicious when I want to be.
I’ll scratch you and...pull your hair and...
Probably hug you or something.
Fuck yeah.
Sara and I hug for almost seven minutes before I remember that I have something to do.
I have something to do.
Okay.
Sara leaves.
{i}Sara’s lust has increased to [sara_lust]!{/i}
{i}You can now choose between affection and lust when inviting her over!{/i}
